abstract.t: This document surveys the short and middle range radio technologies that are suitable to provide a Deterministic Networking / Reliable and Available Wireless (RAW) service over, presents the characteristics that RAW may leverage, and explores the applicability of the technologies to carry deterministic flows, as of its time of publication. The studied technologies are Wi-Fi 6/7, TimeSlotted Channel Hopping (TSCH), 3GPP 5G, and L-band Digital Aeronautical Communications System (LDACS).
